UIInqueryReport.SQLScriptTemplate: SELECT DISTINCT D.CCN as CCN, D.MAS_LOC, D.LOCATION, D.BIN, D.ITEM, C.DESCRIPTION ITEM_DESCRIPTION, C.COMMODITY, B.ISSUE_CODE, E.ABC, B.LOB_CODE, E.BUYER, C.PLANNER, B.RELIEF_EXCEPTION_FLAG, B.BOX_CODE, D.NETTABLE, D.INSP_STAT, D.MRB_DISP, D.OH_QTY, D.COM_QTY, D.USER_NUM1 RESERVED_QTY, E.STD_COST, (E.STD_COST * D.OH_QTY) EXTD_COST, F.CYCLE_COUNT_DATE, cast(D.USER_DATE as date) LAST_TRAN_DATE, E.FINGOOD, B.COA, B.CONSIGNED, B.BULK_EXPENSED, B.RETURN_ON_ASN FROM glovia_prog40.C_ITEM A, glovia_prog40.C_ITMCCN B, glovia_prog40.ITEM C, glovia_prog40.ITEM_DET_12 D, glovia_prog40.ITEM_CCN E, glovia_prog40.ITEM_ML F, glovia_prog40.COMMOD G, glovia_prog40.LOC H WHERE D.ITEM = C.ITEM AND D.REVISION = C.REVISION AND C.ITEM = A.ITEM AND C.REVISION = A.REVISION AND D.CCN = E.CCN AND D.ITEM = E.ITEM AND D.REVISION = E.REVISION AND E.CCN = B.CCN AND E.ITEM = B.ITEM AND E.REVISION = B.REVISION AND D.CCN = F.CCN AND D.ITEM = F.ITEM AND D.REVISION = F.REVISION AND D.MAS_LOC = F.MAS_LOC AND G.COMMODITY = C.COMMODITY AND H.CCN = D.CCN AND H.MAS_LOC = D.MAS_LOC AND H.LOCATION = D.LOCATION AND D.CCN IN (%CCN%) AND D.MAS_LOC IN (%MASLOC%) AND TO_CHAR(D.UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = %SNAPSHOTDATE%

SELECT 'C10000' Region, AL2.ITEM, AL1.DESCRIPTION, AL4.LOB_CODE, AL1.COMMODITY, AL2.ITRN_HIS_DATE, AL2.ITRN_HIS_TIME, AL7.MLOC_DESC, AL3.TX_TYPE_SHORT_DESC, AL2.REF, AL2.RECEIVER, AL2.CCN, AL2.MAS_LOC, AL2.LOCATION, AL2.BIN, AL2.FROM_TO_CCN, AL2.FROM_TO_MAS_LOC, AL2.GL_ACCT, AL2.QTY, AL2.REASON, AL5.CONTROL_NUMBER, AL5.TRACKING_NUMBER, AL3.DIRECTION, AL2.AGC, AL2.TRAN_COST, AL2.QTY * AL2.TRAN_COST as EXT_TRAN_COST, AL5.ORDER_NUMBER, NULL SOURCE, NULL SOURCE_QUAL, AL2.USR_ OPER_ID, NULL COMMENTS_TX, NULL TRANS_QTY, NULL INSP_STAT, NULL User_Name AL2.POSTING_DATE AS_OF_DATE FROM ITEM AL1 INNER JOIN ITRN_HIS AL2 on AL2.ITEM = AL1.ITEM AND AL2.REVISION = AL1.REVISION INNER JOIN DELL_INV_TX_TYPS AL3 on AL3.SOURCE_NUM = AL2.SOURCE AND AL3.QUAL_NUM = AL2.SOURCE_QUAL INNER JOIN C_ITMCCN AL4 on AL2.CCN = AL4.CCN AND AL2.ITEM = AL4.ITEM INNER JOIN C_ITRNHS AL5 on AL2.CCN = AL5.CCN AND AL2.MAS_LOC = AL5.MAS_LOC AND AL2.ITEM = AL5.ITEM AND AL2.REVISION = AL5.REVISION AND AL2.ITRN_HIS_DATE = AL5.ITRN_HIS_DATE AND AL2.ITRN_HIS_TERMINAL = AL5.ITRN_HIS_TERMINAL AND AL2.ITRN_HIS_TIME = AL5.ITRN_HIS_TIME AND AL2.ITRN_HIS_SEQ = AL5.ITRN_HIS_SEQ INNER JOIN MAS_LOC AL7 on AL2.MAS_LOC = AL7.MAS_LOC AND AL2.CCN = AL7.CCN INNER JOIN ITEM_CCN AL8 on AL1.ITEM = AL8.ITEM and AL8.CCN = Al2.CCN WHERE AL2.CCN IN (%CCN%) and AL2.MAS_LOC IN (%MASLOC%) AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(AL2.ITRN_HIS_DATE), 'DDMMYYYY') || AL2.ITRN_HIS_TIME, 'DDMMYYYYHH24MISS') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(%SNAPSHOTDATE-1%), 'DDMMYYYY') || ('000000'), 'DDMMYYYYHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(AL2.ITRN_HIS_DATE), 'DDMMYYYY') || AL2.ITRN_HIS_TIME, 'DDMMYYYYHH24MISS') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(%SNAPSHOTDATE%), 'DDMMYYYY') || ('000000'), 'DDMMYYYYHH24MISS')
